rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A small welcoming area with a foyer that adheres to Art Deco style detailing and Vastu principles for positive energy flow. The entrance hall is aligned along the east-west axis.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room featuring geometric patterns in Art Deco design with modern furniture arrangements. Large windows allow ample natural light from the east ensuring a harmonious Vastu layout.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen designed with vintage Art Deco cabinetry and stainless steel finishes. It includes modern appliances and is positioned towards the northeast for auspicious energy as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom reflecting classic Art Deco elegance with intricate detailing. The bed placement adheres to Vastu guidelines ensuring restful sleep by facing the direction of beneficial energies.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: A separate living space for domestic help that includes a small bedroom and an attached mini-kitchenette. The layout respects privacy and follows Vastu by being placed on the south side of the plot.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: An entertainment room designed with state-of-the-art soundproofing and comfortable seating arranged in an Art Deco style. The placement is on the north to maintain optimal acoustics according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-appointed ensuite bathroom designed with elegant fixtures and finishes inspired by Art Deco aesthetics, located near master bedroom for convenience.

rooms.name: Garden Lobby
rooms.description: An open transition space connecting the interior to the expansive garden. This area is designed as an outdoor extension of living areas and features decorative Art Deco elements.

openings.description: The main entrance includes a grand archway with decorative detailing consistent with Art Deco style. It is strategically placed facing east to receive auspicious sunlight as per Vastu guidelines.
A dedicated gate that provides direct access to the expansive garden, ensuring natural connectivity and adhering to Vastu by allowing positive energy flow from nature into the home.
